items.title: Snap reaches settlement in social media addiction lawsuit

items.title: Level Lock Pro Review (2026): Smart but Stylish
items.description: You’d never guess Level’s Lock Pro is smart by looking at it, and that’s my favorite part.

items.title: India’s app downloads rebounded to 25.5 billion in 2025, fueled by AI assistants and microdrama boom
items.description: ChatGPT was the second most downloaded app in India for 2025 after Instagram.

items.title: Amagi slides in India debut, as cloud TV software firm tests investor appetite

items.title: Language learning marketplace Preply’s unicorn status embodies Ukrainian resilience
items.description: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.
